name: COMMAND
description: Made for Lartu's Mini-RPG One-Week Jam. You're a number in a line of binary and you just decide to stop being a line of code for a day. Antivirus and Debuggers are on your tail, but you have trinkets at your disposal and a nifty trick- you navigate the menus as if they're jumping puzzles in a platformer. This is just a demo, but the game is still being actively worked on. Last update: 3/11/18.
